footer.title: Secure payment guarantee
footer.subtitle: All the data entered in the forms of our online store are stored securely encrypted under the SSL certified security protocol. In the same way, the payment system is carried out through a secure bank gateway.

wrinkle-solution-toner.label: Wrinkle Solution Toner
wrinkle-solution-toner.description: These products provide you with vitamins and antioxidants!

make-up.label: Make Up

body-care.label: Body Care
body-care.description: These products provide cleansing, exfoliating, and hair removal to nail care and body brushing!

mask-pack.label: Mask Pack
mask-pack.description: These masks are formulated with various ingredients that cater to different skincare needs, such as hydration, brightening, pore refinement, soothing, and more!

perfume.label: Perfume
perfume.description: These are created through a careful blending of various aromatic ingredients, resulting in a unique and distinctive fragrance that can evoke emotions, memories, style, personal associations, and an individual's personality!

nail-care.label: Nail Care
nail-care.description: These products encompass a range of practices and products aimed at maintaining the health, strength, and appearance of the nails!

all.label: All
all.description: A wide range of products and practices, offering a comprehensive selection to meet diverse needs. Whether you're looking for fragrances that evoke emotions, nail care for maintaining healthy and stylish nails, or any other beauty essentials, you'll find them all here. Explore our extensive collection and discover the perfect products to enhance your personal style and well-being!
